[[Tar-Calmacil]]}}: South}}</ref> aged 246 years) was the eighteenth King of [[Gondor]].

{{disambig-two: Calmacil was the son of King [[Atanatar II]] Alcarin and younger brother to [[Narmacil I
the [[Kings of Gondor: Narmacil]]. The two brothers had inherited their father's love for ease and neglect of political matters. His son, [[Minalcar]], was unlike them, a man of great vigour.

{{disambig-two: When his indolent older brother Narmacil became King, he bestowed upon Minalcar to be a [[Regent of Gondor
When Narmacil died without heirs in {{TA
the [[Kings of Gondor: 1294}}, Calmacil was too old to succeed him as a King<ref name="South"/> so he continued to have his son Minalcar function as Regent<ref>{{App
King]] of [[Gondor]]: Gondor}}</ref> until he was properly succeeded after his death.
